content: only pm for start of round join to work in round if you have any questions about the pattern or wish to use the work in st st until work meas approx 1 25 / 3 cm from the pattern for commercial purposes please contact cast on edge carol@stolenstitches com thank you to my technical editor meaghan schmaltz and my body photographer joseph feller helical stripe 1 continuing to work in st st begin working helical stripes alternating c1 with c2 every other round until work from start of c2 is approx 1 25 / 3 cm helical stripe 2 break c1 using felted join to join c3 begin working helical stripes alternating c2 with c3 every other round until work from start of c3 is approx 1 25 / 3 cm helical stripe 3 break c2 using felted join to join c4 begin working helical stripes alternating c3 with c4 every other round until work from start of c4 is approx 1 25 / 3 cm helical stripe 4 break c3 using felted join to join c5 begin working helical stripes alternating c4 with c5 every other round until work from start of c5 is approx 1 25 / 3 cm
